channel.title: Help 718/742 item on object delay :S

item.title: Help 718/742 item on object delay :S
item.dc:creator: @khayam khayam
item.description:
@khayam wrote:

hi im trying work on adding my own farming but im kind of stuck on one bit, ive managed to do everything except being able to add a delay time to get seeds, eg i want to plant a seed and recieve the product after 15 secs, this is my code atm:
[sub]} else if (itemId == 5318 && object.getId() == 3465) {
if (player.getSkills().getLevel(Skills.FARMING) >= 1 && player.getInventory().containsItem(5341,

1)) {
player.setNextAnimation(new Animation(2273));
player.getInventory().deleteItem(5318, 1);
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage(“you will recive your potatoes in 15 seconds!”);
player.getSkills().addXp(Skills.FARMING, 1000);
player.Setdelay(50);
player.getInventory().addItem(****, 1);
}else{
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage(“You need a rake and a type of seed to farm!”);
} [/sub]
u see i tried to add a delay timer " player.Setdelay(50);" but doesnt seem to work, it just farms it instantly( and yes i tried changing “50” to a higher number too but didnt work) so could some1 help me please or explain what should i do.
oh and yes im using objecthandler.java

please help thank you!
